XiaomiMiMo/MiMo

7B language model trained specifically for math and code reasoning, matches o1-mini performance

Related repos

  • Muon optimizer for training large language models
  • open-source language and vision models with huge context window and hybrid attention
  • Benchmark for jailbreaking language models
  • Programming system for writing in English
  • no-code GUI for fine-tuning large language models
  • World’s first open-weight hybrid-attention reasoning model with 1M token context and 456B parameters
  • Tool for building and optimizing prompt programs for large language models
  • open-source large language model focused on complex reasoning
  • Run large language models locally, manage and interact with different model types
  • minimal PyTorch code for training your own small language model from scratch
